item.description:
What:   Water Country

Where:  Portsmouth see www.watercountry.com for directions

When: Sunday July31st 9:30am

Host Joan Dg7 603-305-7114  Joandarragh@comcast.net

Co-host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962 ob@tds.net

Group rate: $26. But we all need to go in at the same time.

Regular rate: $38. If you don't go in with us. So, please be there at 9:30 am.

This event is posted with other Groups.

Joan Dg7 wrote:

Bring your friends, family and kids.

Let’s meet for a day of fun and relaxation at the water park! From slides that get the heart pumping to relaxing floats down the lazy river, this park has it all for all ages. Check out all the attractions at www.watercountry.com

We’ll meet at the group entrance (just beyond the ticket booth)to enter the park at 10:00. We must enter together to get the group discount. If we get 25 or more, we’ll get the group rate of $26 (regular admission is $38). Kids under 48” are $22 ($25 is non-group rate). Don’t buy a ticket if you are going in at 10:00 with the group. Bring cash (exact change please) as everyone pays at once at the group entrance.

If you want to meet us later, you have to come in through the regular gate at regular prices. We’ll be located near the wave pool at the picnic tables. Look for Meetup signs on the picnic tables near the Wave Pool.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Water Country Water Park
